content:
As an AI language model, I don't have personal opinions or beliefs but I can provide you with some insights. 

Yes, it is highly likely that businesses will continue to focus on online engagement even after the pandemic. The pandemic has accelerated the shift towards digital and remote work, and businesses have realized the benefits of having a strong online presence and engaging with their audience in a meaningful way. Online engagement allows businesses to reach a wider audience, build brand loyalty, gather valuable customer feedback, and create a sense of community around their brand. It also offers more cost-effective marketing strategies than traditional advertising methods. Therefore, it is expected that businesses will continue to invest in their online engagement efforts, even when the pandemic is over.
